reviews.customers_say: Customers find the undershirt soft with a silky drape and appreciate its fit, with one noting it works well under sweaters and coats.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant silky mock turtleneck.
items.body: I was so surprised at how luxurious this jersey feels. It’s like slipping into a silky glove. The color is vibrant. Size is true. Love this top. It is a bit on the thin side, but that’s fine with me as I bought it to wear under sweaters and sweatshirts. Read more
items.author: Pamela Anderson-Livingston

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty color
items.body: I love the color one of my favorite colors. It fit well and very warm, it’s good for the price , I purchase many other colors . I love turtlenecks for winter !! I give it five stars!! Read more
items.author: Barbara Williams

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very light. / thin fabric
items.body: Sizing accurate-a bit thinner than I realized, but still a nice garment Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and fits well
items.body: Soft and fits well. Did not shrink when I washed it. I wear it under scrub tops in the winter. Read more
items.author: LL

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin and see-thru
items.body: This is ok for layering only, not a stand alone top. You can see right through it and it's very thin Read more
items.author: Random person

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and affordable
items.body: LOVE this Turtleneck! It's soft, the fabric is breathable, and the color is vibrant (yes, I know it's black) So I'll ordering this in another color. Great price e too! Read more
items.author: Charron Oliver

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but too thin to be used for warmth
items.body: Very nice material , very thin ,fits nicely under a shirt or sweatshirt, but it won't provide any warmth at all, it's just adds another very thin silky layer. I ordered two, I'll keep both because I can wear them under a sweatshirt and it'll you know keep the wind off my neck at least and a second layer over my stomach and back. Read more
items.author: George Henson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: It’s super soft and really comfortable. True to size Read more
items.author: Milena

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Army Green, Hot Pink, Black, Coffee, Light Blue, Red, Baby Blue, Navy, Pink, White, Beige, Ivory, Green, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
